atk-s0303a7:0_0: The Linked Discourses on dragons are complete.

atk-s0303a7:4_14: Because of that long life they become long-lived, beautiful, and very happy, lasting harm and suffering. There they gave this gift.

atk-s0303a7:5_0: The Book of Nāgadatta is finished.
